name: Jumping Blocks PC
description:
Just as we have said in the android version of our game that Jumping Blocks is another project Emzzy'sDynasty made, and we would like you all to check it out. This is PC version of our game i.e it can only be downloaded on your computer. 

Jumping Blocks. The Jumping Blocks game is a fun filled exciting game. In the game, the player must run away from the red monster that is capable of ending it's life..... That's enough info about our game for now, why not try it out and let's see how far you can run before the red monster catches up with you. We hope you love our game and we hope you check out other amazing games made by our company Emzzy'sDynasty. Thank you so much for your time and we hope you love the game.

To know more about us, check out our following platforms.

Discord server: https://discord.gg/xquyDdJa

Thank You very much for your time
